name: Complete Project Proposal
short_description: Finish and submit the client project proposal draft.
long_description: Review all client requirements, finalize the project scope, write the proposal document, and send it to the team lead for approval before submission. Ensure all financial estimates are included.

name: Team Meeting
long_description: Discuss project progress, roadblocks, and next steps with the team. Prepare updates on your tasks and take notes on action items. Meeting link will be shared via email.

name: Client Feedback Review
short_description: Analyze client feedback on latest deliverable.
long_description: Compile all client comments from the shared document, categorize them by priority, and create a plan to address critical issues first. Schedule a call with the client if clarifications are needed.

name: Gym Session
long_description: Focus on upper body strength training: 3 sets of bench press, shoulder press, and bicep curls. Include 15 minutes of cardio warm-up and stretching to prevent injuries.

name: Grocery Shopping
long_description: Purchase vegetables, fruits, dairy, and pantry staples from the supermarket. Check the meal plan list and donâ€™t forget to pick up cat food for Mittens.

name: Family Dinner
long_description: Prepare a 3-course meal (appetizer, main course, dessert) and decorate the dining area. Confirm dietary restrictions with Mom and Dad beforehand. Set the table by 6 PM.

name: Research Paper Draft
short_description: Write first draft of AI ethics paper.
long_description: Complete sections 1-3 (introduction, literature review, methodology) of the 10-page paper. Use at least 5 academic sources and follow APA formatting guidelines. Submit to professor for feedback.

name: Math Problem Set
long_description: Complete all 12 problems on derivatives and integrals. Show step-by-step solutions and verify answers using Wolfram Alpha. Group study allowed but no copying.

name: Group Project Meeting
long_description: Decide slide distribution, review content coherence, and practice timing. Assign someone to handle Q&A preparation. Meet in Library Room B at 2 PM.

name: Read Chapter 5
long_description: Read Chapter 5 (Neural Networks) from the 'Machine Learning Basics' textbook. Highlight key concepts and write a 1-page summary with examples. Submit to the online portal.
